description: Professor Why disappears mysteriously. You have to fly to his space base Muta to investigate what happened. The supercomputer CORE may be responsible for his disappearance. You need to face one of its infected robots, The Quantum Eye and solve all of its puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer OS Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 3.10GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 650 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: mouse or gamepad
